Compose é…ç½®

version: "2.3"
services:
  emby:
    image: emby/embyserver
    container_name: embyserver
    environment:
      - UID=1000
      - GID=100
      - GIDLIST=100
    volumes:
      - '/volume1/docker/embyserver/programdata:/config'
      - '/volume2/video:/volume2/video'
      - '/volume2/aliyun:/volume2/aliyun'
    ports:
      - '8096:8096'
      - '8920:8920'
    devices:
      - /dev/dri:/dev/dri
    restart: on-failure
